channel.title: cURL on Ricky
channel.description: Recent content in cURL on Ricky

item.title: Fetch GraphQL schema information
item.description: curl \ -XPOST \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{"query":"{__schema { types { name enumValues { name } fields { name type {name kind enumValues { name } ofType { name kind ofType {name kind}}}}}}}"}' \ https://example.com/graphql
